descriptions: Added full compatibility with QBOX and ox_inventory standards
Implemented TriggerLatentServerEvent for saving projects to prevent 'Large Event' network warnings
Fixed 'Failed to fetch' NUI error ensuring smoother UI interactions
Fixed logic for blockImages config preventing the image selection menu from opening
Fixed external image URLs (http/https) not displaying correctly when Base64 data is missing
Fixed gallery preview not checking/updating immediately after saving a new graffiti
Fixed various NUI callbacks to ensure better data synchronization between Client and React
Replaced standard event triggers with optimized handlers for better performance on high-population servers
